title: If someone wants to change oneself, what should be the first thing that one should change? - Quora

response.answer_text: This depends entirely upon the individual. It seems to me if one is committed to change, the first step would be to self-examine. Figure out what you want to change and prioritize your list. It’s likely to change once you’re in the process, but it’s important to have a starting point. Then do some research into the top priority issue on your list and start instituting recommended steps. Keep moving through your priority list in that fashion. Remember that change isn’t easy but it’s worth pursuing if it will better your life. Good luck!
